history.content:
​UC Berkeley's Student Technology Services (STS) is hiring! STS is a program to ensure all graduate, professional, and undergraduate students have access to technology information, resources, and support. Applications open on Monday, September 27th, and close on Sunday, October 10th!

 

STS offers a student-oriented work environment, flexible work hours, and opportunities to strengthen and grow your technical skillset in a professional environment. STS welcomes applications from students of every background! We believe that we can best serve the needs of the student body when our staff represents as many diverse perspectives and experiences as possible. This includes, but is not limited to, academic discipline, length of campus attendance, academic level, and personal identity groups (e.g. race, ethnicity, gender, class, ability, age, etc). 

 

STS is currently hiring for multiple positions across 6 roles, including both technical and non-technical roles. The wage varies from $16.75 - $22.75/hour and work-study is welcomed, but not required. All students with an interest in technology, regardless of experience, are strongly encouraged to apply.

 The available positions include:

  • Endpoint Engineer

  • Network Engineering Assistant

  • Network Engineering (Lead)

  • Student Technology Consultant

  • Windows System Administrator

  • Windows System Administrator (Lead)

 

To find more about the application process and open positions, visit studenttech.berkeley.edu/jobs 

 

Applications close: Sunday, October 10th!

 

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!

 

Thank you,

Makena Umnas

Student Technology Services - Student Outreach Coordinator

sts-hiring@berkeley.edu

University of California, Berkeley
history.subject: UC Berkeley's Student Technology Services (STS) is hiring! (thru 10/10)
